name: Headdress of Darkness [Pulsating]
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users electric resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance a bit.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
